column34:
We all know that there's a big controversy going on between Amber and Johnny Right now with their Trial. 

Amber took everything away from Johnny and nothing seems to be getting done, so let's take a bigger step and let's give Johnny the world and appreciation that he deserves. 

Amber needs to be taken out of the acting industry altogether and needs to learn what it's like to have everything taken away from you.

 So here I am making this petition to take her out !! 

 

Thank you Guys
